title: Metalogix Software Named a Finalist for Best Office 365 Solution
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 6:00 AM   Metalogix 
WASHINGTON, DC -- (Marketwired) -- 09/30/15 -- Metalogix , the premier provider of collaboration content management software to move, manage and secure content in the cloud and on-premises environments, today announced that Metalogix Essentials for Office 365 , its comprehensive solution for Office 365 lifecycle management, has been named a finalist in the 2015 European SharePoint Community Awards ' Office 365 category. Voting for the awards is now open to the SharePoint Community through October 30. Finalists will be announced on November 11. 
"We are honored to be recognized by the decisive SharePoint community as a key innovator in solutions for Office 365," said Steven Murphy, CEO, Metalogix. "Metalogix Essentials for Office 365 is the unified platform organizations trust to help eliminate administrative workload while ensuring the security and efficiency of the Office 365 environment. It helps organizations optimize all areas of their Office 365 lifecycle management as they work to move, manage and secure their cloud-based content with seamless simplicity." 
Metalogix Essentials for Office 365 is a single, extensible platform that provides a comprehensive set of features to move, manage and secure Office 365 for SharePoint, OneDrive for Business and Exchange content. It enables administrators to easily perform day-to-day management and security operations. From migrating to Office 365, day-to-day user and environmental analysis, to optimization, security and backup/restore operations, Essentials reduces the administrative workload while ensuring that your environment remains secure and efficient. 
To request your free, 14-day trial of Metalogix Essentials for Office 365 visit: http://www.metalogix.com/essentialsforoffice365 . 
To place your vote in the 2015 European SharePoint Community Awards, visit: http://www.sharepointeurope.com/content/the-european-sharepoint-community-awards-finalists-2015 . 
About Metalogix Metalogix is the premier provider of management software to move, manage and secure content for Office 365, SharePoint, OneDrive for Business, Exchange, Box, Dropbox, Amazon, Google and other leading enterprise content management (ECM) systems in the cloud, on-premises and hybrid environments. Over 20,000 clients rely on Metalogix and the industry's highest rated LIVE 24x7 support to enhance the use, performance and security of content collaboration in the cloud, on-premises and in hybrid environments. 
Metalogix is a Microsoft Gold Partner, an EMC Select Partner, and a GSA provider. Our Client Service division of certified specialists is a multiple winner of the prestigious NorthFace ScoreBoard Award for World Class Excellence in Customer Service.
